channel.title: Technology on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on Home

item.title: Welding
item.description: We are dedicated to delivering welding and inspection processes that adhere to the stringent standards of ISO 3834-2. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our use of advanced techniques, including MIG (131), MAG (135), and TIG (141). From concept to creation, our metal fabrication services cover a wide spectrum, including structural steel, aluminum, and stainless steel fabrication. We understand that each project is unique. That’s why International Welding Engineer (IWE) is an integral part of our team.

item.title: Welding automation
item.description: CTP 1350 We delveloped device for welding long welds. The device is mainly desinged for welding long welds of fillet welds and butt welds by methods MIG or MAG. Advantages of this device is simultaneous welding from two sides. Its main components consist of a support frame with a longitudinal positioning table for workpieces and a horizontal linear track with a traversing carriage. This track includes a carriage drive, wire feeders, welding torches, technological torches with vertical and horizontal correction supports, welding torch holders, and a control unit.

item.title: Laser cutting
item.description: Laser Genius+ 2040 6kW, PRIMA POWER Material Maximum thickness Construction steel 25mm Stainless steel 25mm Aluminium 25mm Copper 10mm Brass 10mm

item.title: Machining
item.description: Milling machine VMCA 1000 CNC Lifting capacity table Dimension of table Spindle 800 kg 1520 x 520 mm 10 000 rev/min Turning machine SA 48/1000 CNC Maximum turning length Maximum workpiece weight Spindle 1000 mm 1500 kg 100 - 4500 rev/min

item.title: Assemblies and products testing
item.description: Besides classical engineering production, we offer our clients the production of all cooperation parts and consequent installation in complete assemblies of finished product.

item.title: Engineering
item.description: We offer our customers the production from simple burnouts on our laser cutting machine including bending, welding and surface treatment, up to the delivery of complicated weldment units including machining and consequent assembly. We are able to weld steel structures up to the weight of 5000 kg.

item.title: Blasting
item.description: We perform glass blasting of stainless steel
